scripts.copy-dist-files-app: mkdir -p dist/app && cp -r fluid dist/app && cp index.html dist/app && cp -r css dist/app
scripts.build-app: yarn clean-app && yarn copy-dist-files-app && spago bundle-app --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' --main App.Main --to dist/app/app.js
scripts.build-tests: yarn clean-tests && yarn copy-dist-files-tests && spago bundle-app --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' --main Test.Main --to dist/tests/app.js
scripts.build-app-tests: yarn clean-app-tests && yarn copy-dist-files-app-tests && spago bundle-app --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' --main Test.App.Main --to dist/app-tests/app.js
